original_text:
For you have exacted pledges of your brothers for nothing
    and stripped the naked of their clothing.
korean_text: 까닭 없이 형제를 볼모로 잡으며 헐벗은 자의 의복을 벗기며

sentences.original_text: For you have exacted pledges of your brothers for nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 헛되이 네 형제들에게서 저당을 잡았다

sentences.original_text: and stripped the naked of their clothing.
